game.name: Retired
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RETRO HYPER TIRE RACING! Cruise down hills through 5 different developer created worlds competing for the best track time, or race through a nearly infinite supply of User created levels through the steam workshop!
game.shortDescriptionEn: RETRO HYPER TIRE RACING! Cruise down hills through 5 different developer created worlds competing for the best track time, or race through a nearly infinite supply of User created levels through the steam workshop!
